pinyin: guo2 ji4 ri4 qi1 bian4 geng1 xian4

definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion
to change or replace/to experience/one of the five two-hour periods into which the night was formerly divided/watch (e.g. of a sentry or guard)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Edward's hometown of Gambell is only a few miles from the International Date Linw.
sentences.chinese: 愛德華的家鄉乾貝爾距離國際日期變更線僅有數英里。
